channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Jira Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Jira Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-49653|2024-08-02T22:01:25.963Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jira%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Jira Plugin 3.11 and earlier does not set the appropriate context for credentials lookup, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to access and capture credentials they are not entitled to.
